name.japanese: ロングリングロングランド

description: A unique island composed of ten islands connected in a ring formation. The island is inhabited by nomadic people and features extremely elongated animals. It serves as the setting for the Davy Back Fight between the Straw Hat Pirates and the Foxy Pirates.

keyEvents.title: Groggy Ring Battle Continues
keyEvents.description: The second round of the Davy Back Fight continues on Long Ring Long Land with Sanji and Zoro facing the Groggy Monsters.
keyEvents.significance: The island serves as the battleground for this crucial competition between the two pirate crews.

keyEvents.title: Groggy Ring Victory
keyEvents.description: Zoro scores the winning goal by dunking Big Pan through the goal, securing the Straw Hats' victory in the Groggy Ring match on Long Ring Long Land.
keyEvents.significance: The Straw Hats win the second round of the Davy Back Fight at this location.
